title: China Increasing Its Regional Power
description: We go to two places where China has been exerting control. In Hong Kong, the government finally passed national security laws that are seen by critics as eroding civil liberties. In the Philippines, China's attempts to expand its territorial waters are being met with increasingly fiery rhetoric from senior officials.

title: Reddit and YouTube must face a lawsuit over the radicalization of the Buffalo shooter
description: The sites' algorithms served the 18-year-old with increasingly extremist content and led to the attack, the suit claims. On Monday, a judge rejected the companies' request to have the suit dismissed.

title: Threats, debt and Trump's advances: 'Stormy' doc examines the life of Stormy Daniels
description: A new documentary chronicles Stormy Daniels' legal battle with former President Donald Trump, and how it has changed her and her family.

title: So long, Stumpy. More than 150 of D.C.'s cherry trees have to go as water rises
description: Washington, D.C.'s famous cherry blossoms hit peak bloom this week. This will be the last season for about 150 of the famous flowering trees — they'll soon be cut down to adjust to sea-level rise.

title: Negotiators reach spending deal but timeline is tight to avoid shutdown
description: The deal between negotiators from he House and the White House would fund the government until the end of the fiscal year, Sept. 30.

title: In a pandemic milestone, the NIH ends guidance on COVID treatment
description: The National Institutes of Health is sunsetting its influential COVID-19 treatment guidelines, used by millions of doctors to guide care during the pandemic.

title: Famine in Gaza is 'imminent;' how Louisana's abortion ban changed maternal care
description: People in Gaza are suffering from "catastrophic levels of hunger," according to a group of global experts. Doctors say Louisiana's abortion ban has led to big deviations in maternal care.

title: Rents are high and housing vouchers are hard to get. So Philly is giving renters cash
description: The pilot program chose people on the city's long waitlist for housing vouchers to test how much direct cash payments can help. HUD, the federal housing agency, is interested in the possibility.

title: Standard pregnancy care is now dangerously disrupted in Louisiana, report reveals
description: A troubling new report from Louisiana shows how the state's abortion ban from 2022 is forcing doctors to delay or withhold medical care in ways that make pregnancy more dangerous.

title: A 2024 March Madness vocabulary: How to sound like you know what you're talking about
description: The NCAA basketball tournaments can be onslaught of unfamiliar names and terms enough to make any casual viewer nervous. We're here to help. (Except for NET. We can't explain NET.)

title: New data shows it's gotten easier to vote in the U.S. since 2000
description: Nearly 97% of voting-age U.S. citizens now live in a state with some form of early voting, according to a new report.

title: A refugee family was going hungry — until a fast food manager risked his job to help
description: After fleeing to the U.S. from the Soviet Union, River Adams was struggling to survive. Then a kind gesture changed everything.

title: For the 68 orphans saved from Rafah, the road to recovery is likely to be a long one
description: The 68 children without parental care are getting a reprieve from war, but children who experience armed conflict often face long-lasting impacts when it comes to their mental health and development.

title: Sports Illustrated will continue its print edition under a new publisher
description: Minute Media took over on Monday after reaching a licensing agreement with Authentic Brands Group. What this means for the writers and others who produce Sports Illustrated remains to be seen.

title: United Airlines CEO tries to reassure customers that the airline is safe
description: In a memo to customers, CEO Scott Kirby tried to reassure travelers that safety is the airline's top priority. He said the airline was already planning an extra day of training for pilots.

title: Despite bans in some states, more than a million abortions were provided in 2023
description: That's the highest number in more than a decade, according to new research. Medication abortion made up a larger share of the total than in 2020.

title: Pro-Trump attorney arrested after hearing over leaking Dominion documents
description: Stefanie Lambert was arrested by U.S. Marshals after a hearing over possible sanctions against her for disseminating confidential emails from Dominion Voting Systems.

title: RBG award ceremony canceled amid controversy over recipients
description: Rupert Murdoch, Elon Musk and junk bond creator Michael Milken were among the recipients of the 2024 Ruth Bader Ginsburg Leadership Award.
